manifest.author: nightx24
manifest.changelog:
Changelog 

◾️Account Shortcuts
• Enabled account shortcuts for quick access

◾️Reels
• Enabled reels filter carousel and trending reels section

◾️Comments
• Added bulk comment hide option

◾️Tags
• Enabled long-press options on tags

◾️Repost
• Redesigned repost interface
• Enabled repost animation
• Added long-press like button

◾️Gestures
• Enabled swipe-to-dismiss gesture

◾️Fonts
• Enabled AI-generated font support

◾️UI Improvements
• Redesigned primary buttons
• Redesigned individual account notification layout

◾️Stories
• Added option to increase music duration in stories

◾️ Gallery
• Enabled long-press menu in gallery

◾️Performance
• Improved overall user experience
manifest.name: Night-X's Backup
